ygData.subject: Banded Prices
ygData.msgSnippet: If we re all (for the most part) in agreement for regulating prices, let s do it! We have nothing to lose. It s either a slow and painful death, or a quick
ygData.messageBody:
If we're all (for the most part) in agreement for regulating prices,
let's do it! We have nothing to lose. It's either a slow and painful
death, or a quick one. I'd rather get shot than suffocated, so let's go
for it.
Gorget: 6 plat
Mask: 12 plat
Helmet: 14 plat
Bracer: 8 plat
Sleeves: 13 plat
Mantle: 14 plat
Mail: 20 plat
Cloak: 19 plat
Belt: 13 plat
Leggings: 19 plat
Boots 13 plat

Stick to these prices!! If you don't sell, don't worry. I've had people
who thought my old prices (cheaper than this) were too high. They've
come back up to a month later asking, "still selling banded?" Rich will
buy from you, frustrated people who have been auctioning for hours will
buy from you, people who have realized the new standard prices will buy
from you! This can work, we just have to try, so let's try!!!

-Rennin of E'Ci
Trade Council GM
